item.title: Mute and unmute command probelms
item.dc:creator: @usernamenotavailable usernamenotavailable
item.description:
@usernamenotavailable wrote:

Well there certain servers the commands work with… I believe thats a deltascape commands if you try to add that command to a say allstar scape server it wont work. Even if there are slight differences between the commands its still different. Now i don’t have the mute command for my server but i hope this helped with you problem… if i get the command i will post it back onto here.

item.title: Mute and unmute command probelms
item.dc:creator: @killar63111 killar63111
item.description:
@killar63111 wrote:

well i ahd mute command on one of my souces so i decided to add it to my server but didb’t work anything did i do anything wrong with the code?
this is wat i put for mute command

if (command.startsWith("mute")) { try { String mutedName = command.substring(5); int mutedPlayer = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(mutedName); client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[mutedPlayer]; m.silent = 1; sendMessage(mutedName+" has been permanently muted"); m.sendMessage("A member of staff has permanently muted you"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Enter the name of the player you want to permanently mute"); } } and heres unmute

if (command.startsWith("unmute")) { try { String muted = command.substring(7); int playerMuted = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(muted); client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerMuted]; m.silent = 0; m.tempmute = 0; m.sendMessage("A member of staff has lifted your mute, allowing you to talk again"); sendMessage(muted+" is no longer permanently muted"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Enter the name of the player you want to unmute"); } }

so did i do anything wrog or is there more i have to do?

Read full topic
